typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Book_Id as integer '##0',
		ISBN as string,
		ISBN13 as string,
		Title as string,
		Author as string,
		{Author_l-f} as string,
		Additional_Authors as string,
		Average_Rating as string,
		Publisher as string,
		Binding as string,
		Number_of_Pages as integer '##0',
		Year_Published as integer '##0',
		Original_Publication_Year as integer '##0'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Books
source(output(
		Book_Id as integer '##0',
		ISBN as string,
		ISBN13 as string,
		My_Rating as integer '##0',
		Date_Read as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Date_Added as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Bookshelves as string,
		Exclusive_Shelf as string,
		My_Review as string,
		Spoiler as boolean,
		Private_Notes as string,
		Read_Count as integer '##0',
		Original_Purchase_Date as date 'dd/MM/yyyy'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Trixies
source(output(
		Book_Id as integer '##0',
		ISBN as string,
		ISBN13 as string,
		My_Rating as integer '##0',
		Date_Read as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Date_Added as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Bookshelves as string,
		Exclusive_Shelf as string,
		My_Review as string,
		Spoiler as boolean,
		Read_Count as integer '##0',
		Original_Purchase_Date as date 'dd/MM/yyyy'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Keikos
source(output(
		Book_Id as integer '##0',
		ISBN as string,
		My_Rating as integer '##0',
		Date_Read as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Date_Added as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Bookshelves as string,
		Exclusive_Shelf as string,
		My_Review as string,
		Spoiler as boolean,
		Private_Notes as string,
		Read_Count as integer '##0',
		Original_Purchase_Date as date 'dd/MM/yyyy'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Minervas
source(output(
		Book_Id as integer '##0',
		ISBN as string,
		ISBN13 as string,
		My_Rating as integer '##0',
		Date_Read as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Date_Added as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Original_Purchase_Date as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Spoiler as boolean,
		Bookshelves as string,
		Exclusive_Shelf as string,
		Private_Notes as string,
		Read_Count as integer '##0',
		My_Review as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Svens
Trixies derive(Reader = "Trixie Belden") ~> AddReaderNameT
Keikos derive(Reader = "Keiko Brooks") ~> AddReaderNameK
Minervas derive(Reader = "Minerva Snape") ~> AddReaderNameM
Svens derive(Reader = "Sven Dorjadt") ~> AddReaderNameS
AddReaderNameT, AddReaderNameK, AddReaderNameM, AddReaderNameS union(byName: true)~> AllReaders
AllReaders sort(asc(Book_Id, true)) ~> SortReadingHistory
SortReadingHistory, Books join(AllReaders@Book_Id == Books@Book_Id
	&& AllReaders@ISBN == Books@ISBN,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinReadersToBooks
JoinReadersToBooks select(mapColumn(
		My_Rating,
		Date_Read,
		Date_Added,
		Bookshelves,
		Exclusive_Shelf,
		My_Review,
		Spoiler,
		Private_Notes,
		Read_Count,
		Original_Purchase_Date,
		Reader,
		Book_Id = Books@Book_Id,
		ISBN = Books@ISBN,
		ISBN13 = Books@ISBN13,
		Title,
		Author,
		{Author_l-f},
		Additional_Authors,
		Average_Rating,
		Publisher,
		Binding,
		Number_of_Pages,
		Year_Published,
		Original_Publication_Year
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveDuplicateColumns
Books, SortReadingHistory join(Books@Book_Id == AllReaders@Book_Id
	&& Books@ISBN == AllReaders@ISBN,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ReaderBooksOuterJoin
ReaderBooksOuterJoin select(mapColumn(
		Book_Id = Books@Book_Id,
		ISBN = Books@ISBN,
		ISBN13 = Books@ISBN13,
		Title,
		Author,
		{Author_l-f},
		Additional_Authors,
		Average_Rating,
		Publisher,
		Number_of_Pages,
		Year_Published,
		Binding,
		Original_Publication_Year,
		My_Rating,
		Date_Read,
		Date_Added,
		Bookshelves,
		Exclusive_Shelf,
		My_Review,
		Spoiler,
		Private_Notes,
		Read_Count,
		Original_Purchase_Date,
		Reader
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveDuplicateColumns2
RemoveDuplicateColumns sink(input(
		Book_Id as string,
		ISBN as string,
		ISBN13 as string,
		My_Rating as string,
		Date_Read as string,
		Date_Added as string,
		Bookshelves as string,
		Exclusive_Shelf as string,
		My_Review as string,
		Spoiler as string,
		Read_Count as string,
		Original_Purchase_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['InnerJoinDataSet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
RemoveDuplicateColumns2 sink(input(
		Book_Id as string,
		ISBN as string,
		ISBN13 as string,
		My_Rating as string,
		Date_Read as string,
		Date_Added as string,
		Bookshelves as string,
		Exclusive_Shelf as string,
		My_Review as string,
		Spoiler as string,
		Read_Count as string,
		Original_Purchase_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['OuterJoinReader'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ReaderBooksOuterJoin1
